query:
SELECT 
  jda.id as approvalId,
  jda.jobDescriptionId,
  jda.currentLevel,
  jda.overallStatus,
  
  -- Nível 2 (Alexsandra)
  jda.level2ApproverId,
  jda.level2ApproverName,
  e2.active as level2Active,
  e2.email as level2Email,
  
  -- Nível 3 (André)
  jda.level3ApproverId,
  jda.level3ApproverName,
  e3.active as level3Active,
  e3.email as level3Email,
  
  -- Nível 4 (Rodrigo)
  jda.level4ApproverId,
  jda.level4ApproverName,
  e4.active as level4Active,
  e4.email as level4Email
  
FROM jobDescriptionApprovals jda
LEFT JOIN employees e2 ON jda.level2ApproverId = e2.id
LEFT JOIN employees e3 ON jda.level3ApproverId = e3.id
LEFT JOIN employees e4 ON jda.level4ApproverId = e4.id
WHERE e2.active = 0 OR e3.active = 0 OR e4.active = 0
LIMIT 10

  jda.level3ApproverId,
  jda.level3ApproverName,
  e3.active as level3Active,
  e3.email as level3Email,
  
  -- Nível 4 (Rodrigo)
  jda.level4ApproverId,
  jda.level4ApproverName,
  e4.active as level4Active,
  e4.email as level4Email
  
FROM jobDescriptionApprovals jda
LEFT JOIN employees e2 ON jda.level2ApproverId = e2.id
LEFT JOIN employees e3 ON jda.level3ApproverId = e3.id
LEFT JOIN employees e4 ON jda.level4ApproverId = e4.id
WHERE e2.active = 0 OR e3.active = 0 OR e4.active = 0
LIMIT 10
